On 12.12.2008, at 19:55, Subbu Allamaraju wrote:

> For instance, in addition to media types, the server also needs to  
> describe all link relations as the standard ones like "self", "edit"  
> may not be descriptive enough to tell what a given link is supposed  
> to.

Good point. It seems to be addressed by

http://www.mnot.net/drafts/draft-nottingham-http-link-header-02.txt

Stefan
